articles.title: Victoria coronavirus update as Epworth healthcare worker among new cases - 7NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Another school in Melbourne’s north has also closed after a staff member returned a positive result.
articles.content:
An Epworth healthcare worker is among the 73 new cases of COVID-19 recorded in Victoria in the last 24 hours.
